channel.title: Research Collaborations on Bhrugu Bhatt
channel.description: Recent content in Research Collaborations on Bhrugu Bhatt

item.title: South Korea - Daegu Science High School Points of Collaboration
item.description: We are currently collaborating with students from the Daegu Science High School in Daegu, South Korea for our research. We have proposed an almost parallel project collaboration structure in which we will continue with our original research idea and they will work on another branch of the topic. Yena Choi and Seoun Park are interested in conducting research on time series data. Therefore, we proposed that they work on time series data which describes the progression of Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia (ALL) and try to predict severity over a period of time.
